summary: This module contains a suite of unit tests that validate the Bedrock image generation workflow in the Litellm library, covering Amazon Stability model support, parameter mapping between OpenAI and Bedrock formats, request body construction, response transformation, and cost calculation logic.
business_intent: Ensure reliable integration of Amazon Stability image generation services with correct pricing, request/response handling, and compatibility with OpenAI-style parameters, thereby maintaining accurate functionality for downstream applications.
